name: On 'Men's Jeans' page pick filter size, check that it is visible, pick one checkbox, check that it is checked and disable it by clicking on appeared filter button

steps.name: Close cookie consent banner, if visible
Go to 'Men's Jeans' section, scroll to size and click
click on 'Jeans' inside 'Men's' section with waiting for presence ofd element
scroll to 'Size' button and click on it
Check if 'Size' area is visible after clicking the size button
Select size checkbox and close adverts modal, if appears
close modal with adverts, if appears
close modal with adverts, if appears
scroll to filter '28x30' and check if it was applied and visible
close filter '28x30' by clicking on it
scroll to 'Size' filter are and check that filter '28x30' disappeared
